meanings: [살짝] lightly, softly, [경미하게] slightly, [수월하게] easily, with ease, [경솔하게] rashly, indiscreetly.

examples.korean: He kissed her lightly on the cheek. 발음듣기 그가 그녀의 볼에 가볍게 입을 맞추었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He kissed her lightly on the cheek. 발음

examples.korean: He pecked her on the cheek as he went out. 발음듣기 그가 나가면서 그녀의 볼에 가볍게 입을 맞추었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: He pecked her on the cheek as he went out. 발음

examples.korean: Nicky roused her with a gentle nudge. 발음듣기 니키가 그녀를 가볍게 흔들어 깨웠다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: Nicky roused her with a gentle nudge. 발음

examples.korean: The boat bobbed like a cork on the waves: light and buoyant. 발음듣기 그 보트는 코르크 부표처럼 가볍게 뜬 채로 파도를 타고 깐닥거렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
